message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $90?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a living too! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $110.
